128 
129     def verify_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> TokenData:
130         """Verify and decode JWT token."""
131         credentials_exception = HTTPException(
132             status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
133             detail="Could not validate credentials",
134             headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
135         )
136 
137         try:
138             payload = jwt.decode(token, SECRET_KEY, algorithms=[ALGORITHM])
139 
140             # Verify token type
141             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
142                 raise credentials_exception
143 
144             user_id: str = payload.get("sub")
145             if user_id is None:
146                 raise credentials_exception
147 
148             token_data = TokenData(
149                 user_id=user_id,
150                 username=payload.get("username"),
151                 scopes=payload.get("scopes", []),
152                 token_id=payload.get("token_id"),
153             )
154 
155             return token_data
156 
157         except JWTError:
158             raise credentials_exception
159
